name: 楊安石
objective: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
schedule:
1  Reviews
2  Basic Concepts and Ideas
3  Separable Differential Eq.
4  Exact ODES;  Linear ODEs 5  Homogeous Linear ODEs. of Second Order; 
5  Homogeous Linear ODEs  with Constant Coefficients
6  Euler-Cauchy Eq; Existence and Uniqueness of Solutions 
7  Nonhomogeous ODEs
8  Homogeous Linear ODEs; Homogeous Linear Eq. with Constant Coefficients
9  期中考
10 Power Series Method
11 Theory of the Power Series Method.
12 Legendre’s Equation; Legendre Polynomials Pn(x).; Frobenius Method. 
13 Bessel’s Equation. Bessel Functions Jv(x).
14 Laplace Transform
15 Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals. ODEs. )
16 Unit Step Function
17 Differentiation and Integration of Transforms
18 期末考
scorePolicy:
1) 兩次期中考與期末考
2) 擇優兩次定為期中成績50%、期末成績50%
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics (10th Edition, John Wiley)
Authors: Erwin Kreyszig
